Ateli]</ref> | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{flag|India}} | subdivision_type1 = [[States and territories of India|State]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Haryana]] | subdivision_type2 = [[List of districts of India|District]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Mahendragarh district|Mahendragarh]] | established_title = <!-- Established --> | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | government_type = | governing_body = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_rank = | area_total_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 299 | population_total = 5671 | population_as_of = 2001 | population_rank = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_footnotes = | demographics_type1 = Languages | demographics1_title1 = Official | demographics1_info1 = [[Hindi language|Hindi]] | timezone1 = [[Indian Standard Time|IST]] | utc_offset1 = +5:30 | postal_code_type = [[Postal Index Number|PIN]] | postal_code = 123021 | registration_plate =[[List of RTO districts in India#HR.E2.80.94Haryana|HR]]-35 | blank1_name_sec1 = [[Human sex ratio|Sex ratio]] | blank1_info_sec1 = 10:9 [[male|♂]]/[[female|♀]] | website = {{URL|haryana.gov.in}} | iso_code = [[ISO 3166-2:IN|IN-HR]] | footnotes = }} '''Ateli''' is a small town and a [[municipal committee]] near [[Narnaul]] in [[Mahendragarh district]] in the north [[India]]n [[States and territories of India|state]] of [[Haryana]].<ref name="2011 Census">{{cite web |title=Ateli (MC) |url=http://www.censusindia.gov.in/pca/SearchDetails.aspx?Id=70395 |website=[[2011 Census of India]] |publisher=[[Government of India]] |accessdate=19 September 2017 |archiveurl=https://archive.today/20170919142012/http://www.censusindia.gov.in/pca/SearchDetails.aspx?Id=70395 |archivedate=19 September 2017 |url-status=live |df=dmy-all }}</ref>
==Geography== Ateli has an average elevation of 299 m (980 feet).
==Demographics== {{As of|2011}} India [[census]], Ateli had a population of 8678. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Ateli has an average literacy rate of 78%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 58% of the males and 42% of females being literate. Thirteen percent of the population is under six years of age. Good well settle area. Descent people.
==Transportation== ===Railways=== [[Ateli railway station]] lies on the [[Rewari]]-Narnaul route. Only slow passenger trains & Chetak Express (12982)stop here.
===Roads=== Rewari-Narnaul highway was a state highway, [[State Highway 26 (Haryana)|SH 26]], and has been made a national highway, [[National Highway 11 (India)|NH 11]]. The highway is being widened to four lanes. The NH connects [[Rewari]] to Ateli, [[Narnaul]], [[Jhunjhunu]] and [[Bikaner]]. Transportation facility is very very good to [[Narnaul]], [[Rewari]], [[Gurgaon]] & [[Delhi]].
==Politics== The current state MLA of Ateli is Sitaram Yadav of [[BJP]].
